Risk Practice

Due to the pandemic, many organizations have prioritized short-term priorities for internal-audit functions, but now is also the time to recalibrate for potential long-term uncertainty and complexity. The primary role of internal-audit (IA) functions is to help decision makers protect organizational assets and reputations, as well as to support operational sustainability.

Key Concepts:

  • Adapting to dynamic risk landscape
  • Providing secure oversight
  • Ensuring operational sustainability
internal-audit risk management organizational assets
